name: PDF及图片高精度解析
author: flyMD
description: 使用大模型高精度识别解析 PDF 和图片为 Markdown 或 Docx并翻译。支持识别手写、布局还原（仅 MD）、公式识别、表格识别

en.name: High-Accuracy PDF & Image Parsing
en.description: Use large models to accurately parse PDF and images into Markdown or Docx with translation, including handwriting, layout reconstruction, formulas and tables.
